features.Resolved: After this creature spends focus to reset a chracter's influence, they lose 1 focus.
features.Broken Arm: This creature can only use one hand.

action.name: Strike: Sidesword
action.description: Attack +3, reach 5 ft., one target. Graze: 3 (1d6) keen damage. Hit: 8 (1d6 + 3) keen damage.

reaction.name: A Friend in Need (Costs 1 Focus)
reaction.description: When an ally within 5 feet of this creature fails a test, this creature adds an Opportunity to the test result.
